name: You Must Kill Evil Devid
description:
Devid! We need you to defeat your evil doppelganger, Evil Devid! You are the only one who both owns a space suit and a sword! You must do this. The fate of everything is in your hands!

Escape - Quit

J - Attack

W,A,S,D - Move

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Raving Energy" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
